name: Gloria Lam Learns The Truth
description:
Gloria, passionate about drinking beer and reading posts on the Internet, joins the Yakima County Paranormal Society as a Social Media Intern. What strange secrets does the desert of Eastern Washington hide?

A 10-15 minute visual novel for your browser. One ending.

Team Holy Roller

  • Isa Hanssen: character artist, animator
  • Marley Townsend: background artist, writer, sound designer
  • Jamie Forrester: programmer, writer, musician

Twitter: @TeamHolyRoller

Join our Discord!
